artifacts.title: Artifacts
artifacts.noArtifacts: No artifacts created yet. Create an artifact to get started.
artifacts.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"?
artifacts.audioFormatDeepDiveDesc: A lively conversation between two hosts, unpacking and connecting topics in your sources
artifacts.audioFormatBriefDesc: A bite-sized overview to help you grasp the core ideas from your sources quickly
artifacts.audioFormatCritiqueDesc: An expert review of your sources, offering constructive feedback to help you improve your material
artifacts.audioFormatDebateDesc: A thoughtful debate between two hosts, illuminating different perspectives on your sources
artifacts.audioFocusLabel: What should the AI hosts focus on in this episode?
artifacts.audioFocusPlaceholder:
Things to try

 • Focus on a specific source ("only cover the article about Italy")
 • Focus on a specific topic ("just discuss the novel's main character")
 • Target a specific audience ("explain to someone new to biology")
artifacts.videoFormatExplainerDesc: A structured, comprehensive overview that connects the dots within your sources
artifacts.videoFormatBriefDesc: A bite-sized overview to help you quickly grasp core ideas from your sources
artifacts.videoFocusLabel: What should the AI hosts focus on?
artifacts.videoFocusPlaceholder:
Things to try

 • Target a specific use case ("present this to a book club", "help me review for a quiz")
 • Focus on a specific source ("show the photos from the album", "focus on the biology paper")
 • Describe the show structure ("start by talking about the mission", "end with next steps")
artifacts.flashcardTopicPlaceholder:
Things to try

 • The flashcards must be restricted to a specific source (e.g. "the article about Italy")
 • The flashcards must focus on a specific topic like "Newton's second law"
 • The card fronts must be short (1-5 words) for memorization
artifacts.quizTopicPlaceholder:
Things to try

 • The quiz must be restricted to a specific source (e.g. "the article about Italy")
 • The quiz must focus solely on the key concepts of physics
 • Create a quiz to help me prepare for my history exam on Ancient Egypt
artifacts.infographicDescriptionLabel: Describe the infographic you want to create
artifacts.infographicDescriptionPlaceholder: Guide the style, color, or focus: "Use a blue color theme and highlight the 3 key stats."
artifacts.slideDeckFormatDetailedDeckDesc: A comprehensive deck with full text and details, perfect for emailing or reading on its own.
artifacts.slideDeckFormatPresenterSlidesDesc: Clean, visual slides with key talking points to support you while you speak.
artifacts.slideDeckDescriptionLabel: Describe the slide deck you want to create
artifacts.slideDeckDescriptionPlaceholder: Add a high-level outline, or guide the audience, style, and focus: "Create a deck for beginners using a bold and playful style with a focus on step-by-step instructions."
artifacts.reportFormatCreateYourOwnDesc: Craft reports your way by specifying structure, style, tone, and more
artifacts.reportFormatBriefingDocDesc: Overview of your sources featuring key insights and quotes
artifacts.reportFormatStudyGuideDesc: Short-answer quiz, suggested essay questions, and glossary of key terms
artifacts.reportFormatBlogPostDesc: Insightful takeaways distilled into a highly readable article
artifacts.reportFormatDesignDocumentDesc: A technical document comparing data models for a new data-intensive application.
artifacts.reportFormatStrategyMemoDesc: A memo outlining a strategy for evolving a system to a distributed architecture.
artifacts.reportFormatConceptExplainerDesc: Learn the essential principles for building strong and lasting data applications.
artifacts.reportFormatComparativeOverviewDesc: Discover the main differences between how databases store and organize information.
artifacts.reportDescriptionLabel: Describe the report you want to create
artifacts.reportDescriptionHelper: Default description is pre-filled. You can edit it if needed.
artifacts.reportDescriptionPlaceholderCreateYourOw:
For example:

Create a formal competitive review of the 2026 functional beverage market for a new wellness drink. The tone should be analytical and strategic, focusing on the distribution and pricing of key competitors to inform our launch strategy.
artifacts.reportDescriptionPlaceholderDefault: Edit the default description or use as-is.
artifacts.reportDescriptionRequired: Description is required for "Create Your Own" format
artifacts.mindMapDescription: Click "Create" to generate a mind map for this notebook. No additional configuration is required.
